page.title: 04CLUBS 1
page.content: MANY CLUBS ARE HELD IN BOTH BRYNCOCH AND CAEWERN COMMUNITY CENTRES.ON MONDAY IN THE B.C.C. THEY HOLD A MOTHER/TODDLER GROUP,O.A.P.'S GROUP AND YOUTH CLUB.IN THE C.C.C. ON A MONDAY THEY HOLD CAEWERN LADIES GROUP.ON TUESDAY IN THE B.C.C. THEY HOLD YOGA CLASSES AND W.I. ON TUESDAY IN THE C.C.C. THEY HOLD YOUTH CLUB.ON WEDNESDAY IN THE B.C.C. THEY HOLD YOGA CLASSES,CHIROPODY CLINIC AND A BABY CLINIC .IN THE C.C.C. ON WEDNESDAY THEY HOLD OPERATION SPORT AND PARENT/CHILD GROUP.ON THURSDAY IN THE B.C.C. THEY HOLD MOTHER/TODDLER GROUP,WHIST DRIVE AND BINGO.IN THE C.C.C. ON A THURSDAY THEY HOLD O.A.P.'S GROUP AND YOUTH CLUB.ON FRIDAY IN THE C.C.C. THEY HOLD A DRAMA WORKSHOP AND BINGO.ON SATURDAY NOTHING IS HELD.ON SUNDAY IN THE C.C.C. ITS SUNDAY SCHOOL.{(SEE NEXT PAGE FOR MORE
